sub_topic: Prove that the union of a set and its complement is the universal set.
message_1: Let U be the universal set consisting of integers between -10 and 10 (inclusive). Let A be the set of even numbers between -10 and 0 (inclusive). What is the complement of set A and what is the set obtained by taking the union of set A and its complement? Show that this union is equal to the set U.
